name: serverx-angular
description: Deploy Angular application to serverless environments using ServeRX-ts
author: Mark Florence

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && rimraf dist && tsc && cp -R model/ dist
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.lib: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.sample-aws: npm run build && node dist/index.js --app sample/app --deploy sample/deploy/aws.json
scripts.sample-google: npm run build && node dist/index.js --app sample/app --deploy sample/deploy/google.json
